prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that resembles a deer with pastel colors and cheerful eyes.
Imagine a grass-type Pokemon with seasonal changes in its appearance and vibrant floral patterns.
Design a Pokemon that can change its color based on the environment, showcasing adaptability.
Show me a Pokemon that is gentle and playful, often found in sunny meadows and forests.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of spring with floral accents and soft features.
Make a small quadruped Pokemon that has a unique ability to blend into grassy landscapes.
Give me a Pokemon that has antlers and a colorful coat, representing the beauty of nature.
